About the Club

Brief History

Founded on the 1st of August 2015 by Sonnia Agu, a Nigerian humanitarian and Social Entrepreneur. The idea is to create a society that is non-political and free from all racial or religious distinctions, ready for the next revolution which is that of the mind. There have been different kinds of revolution, and Africans sadly missed it. hence the creation of The Sapio Club to help connect, empower and prepare great minds for the next global revolution of the Mind. The sapio society welcomes people from every walk of life whose mind, passion and IQ is in the top 2% of the population, with the objective of enjoying each other's company, supporting community development, growing clientele, Network and participating in a wide range of social and cultural activities.

What does "Sapio" mean?

The word "Sapio" means "Wise/Intelligence" in Latin. The word Sapio is from Latin root sapiens, which means wise or intelligent, and Latin word sexualis/sexual, relating to the sexes (male /female) I.e.: - intelligent/wise Fe (Male) Being sapiosexual simply put is one who finds intelligence the most attractive feature in a person. The Sapiosexual Community is an intelligence loving society, where race, color, creed, national origin, age, politics, educational or social background are irrelevant.

Our Goals

To identify and foster human intelligence for the benefit of humanity

To encourage research in the nature, characteristics and uses of intelligence

To promote stimulating intellectual and social opportunities for its members

To support, promote, and prepare Africans both home and diaspora towards the UN 2063 United Africa goal

Become a
Member!

Join the community of Intellectuals.

Join Now
